channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love On Retreat
channel.desc: When hard-working content creator Jenny goes on a retreat in search of the 'life' element of a 'work/life balance', she ends up finding love as well.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Hidden Gems
channel.desc: When Addie loses her grandmother's ring in the waters of Hawaii, she hires a sailor to help her to find it, rediscovering her love of the sea along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Best Version Of Love
channel.desc: Rebecca, an incredibly successful image consultant, is faced with her hardest challenge yet in the charming but surly Clive, a former football star.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Perfect Harmony
channel.desc: Best Man Jack and Maid of Honour Professor Barrett may not sing from the same hymn sheet, but working together on their friends' wedding might just result in a duet of a lifetime.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Pumpkin Everything
channel.desc: An up-and-coming novelist must confront an old flame from her past when she returns to her hometown to look after her stubborn grandfather and his pumpkin-themed store.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love's Secret Ingredient
channel.desc: Sparks fly between the owner of an organic market and a celebrity chef as they work together to make a line of meal kits. Can they get past their workaholic tendencies to find love.
